**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 151 2.0 **Price** 220 gp **Usage** worn headwear **Bulk** L --- Made of materials scavenged from wild places, a _druid's crown_ can be rebuilt for a variety of benefits. The crown grants you a +1 item bonus to a skill, and can be activated to cast a spell, both depending on the material used to build the crown, as listed on the table below. If you invest and wear [_living mantle_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3092) along with the crown, the crown's item bonus increases by 1 and its spell's DC rises to 27. You can invest this item only if you're a [druid](/Classes.aspx?ID=6). When you do, as a 10-minute activity that has the [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) trait, you can disassemble and rebuild the crown with different materials, changing its item bonus and spell accordingly. ##
**Material****Item Bonus****Spell**
Antlers[Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)[_Enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102)
Flowers[Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)[_Animal allies_](/Spells.aspx?ID=863)
Leaves[Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)[_One with Plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1618) <%END>
 **Activate** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The crown casts its spell at 2nd rank (DC 20). **Craft Requirements** You are a druid.
name: Druid's Crown
